other_tests.findings: Low flow in the Fontan circulation, raising suspicion of thrombosis in the Fontan circuit.
No evidence of thrombosis and a patent fenestration.

other_tests.procedure_name: Permanent epicardial dual chamber pacemaker implantation
other_tests.findings: Implanted in the right atrium and right ventricle with the generator implanted in the upper abdominal wall.
Decrease in blood pH and inversion between O2 and CO2 partial pressures.
Multiple pulmonary consolidations, most evident on the upper third of the right lung.
other_tests.changes_over_time: On POD 16, reduction of pulmonary consolidations with a sole remaining opacity in the upper third of the right lung.
